name: What A Pizza Influences
description: A Game For The Vaultacular Game Jam! Get It? Cause "Pizza" Kind-of Sounds Like "Piece Of."  You Can Run, Jump, On Skunks? Don't Forgot To Dodge The Cursed Hot Sauce! The Main Character, Doofus, "Finds" A Rift And Travels Through Space And Time, Or Time And Space?, To Do A Partnership With Twig, A Character He Saw On TV From A Sitcom, About Pizza.
